name: Weddings
description: Create magical moments on your special day with our personalized wedding planning services. From venue selection to decor and catering, we handle everything.

name: Birthday Parties
description: Celebrate birthdays in style with our themed party packages. We arrange everything from invitations and decorations to fun activities and delicious cakes.

name: Anniversaries
description: Commemorate your love story with a memorable anniversary celebration. Our services include elegant decor, gourmet dining, and heartfelt surprises.

name: Engagement Parties
description: Mark the beginning of your journey together with a stylish engagement party. We handle venue arrangements, entertainment, and delightful catering.

name: Retirement Parties
description: Bid farewell to a cherished colleague or loved one with a memorable retirement party. We organize heartfelt speeches, entertainment, and customized gifts.

name: Baby Showers
description: Welcome the newest member of the family with a joyous baby shower. Our services include adorable themes, games, and delightful treats.

name: Graduation Parties
description: Celebrate academic achievements with a lively graduation party. We provide themed decorations, music, and a fun-filled atmosphere.

name: Holiday Gatherings
description: Make your holiday season memorable with our festive gathering services. We handle decorations, catering, and entertainment for a joyful celebration.
